product_name: Swix AI Adjustable Cross-Country Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: The all-purpose Swix AI adjustable ski poles are perfect for backcountry touring, a day at the ski resort or a snowshoe hike though the woods. High-quality 7075 aluminum is light and strong. 2-piece telescoping poles adjust in length to accommodate most skiers; adjust from 47 - 61 in. (120 - 155cm). Ergonomic grips with adjustable nylon wrist straps increase your comfort. Swix AI adjustable ski poles come with powder baskets baskets that provide flotation in soft snow.
short_description: The all-purpose Swix AI adjustable ski poles are perfect for backcountry touring, a day at the ski resort or a snowshoe hike though the woods.
